abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver quarterback Brock Osweiler, who has been starting for injured Peyton Manning, acknowledges that he is actively seeking starting position rather than returning to backup even after Manning recovers; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Osweiler, who will make his sixth straight start Monday for an injured Peyton Manning, wants to make the coaches’ decision tough.

headline.main: Brock Osweiler, Set to Face Bengals, Is in No Hurry to Give Up Job
headline.print_headline: Osweiler, Set to Face Bengals, Is in No Hurry to Give Up Job

snippet: Osweiler, who will make his sixth straight start Monday for an injured Peyton Manning, wants to make the coaches’ decision tough.
